sqlMap.insert:
insert into auction( member_unq, auction_unq, category, sdate, edate, title, image, sprice, deliveryway, deliverypee, seller, sellerphone, detail, auction_del )
values( #member_unq#, auction_seq.nextval, #category#, #sdate#, #edate#, #title#, #image#, #sprice#, #deliveryway#, #deliverypee#, #seller#, #sellerphone#, #detail#, #auction_del# )
